page.title: 01 Oxford
page.content: The dreaming spires of Oxford hold interesting aspects for the Domesday project,for one thing it is one of the few cities with its own radio station.Oxford is most famous for its colleges;the oldest colleges date from the 12th Century.Oxford also holds the head quarters of Oxfam the world famous famine relief centre.Oxford is also famous for its traditions:it still has a sheriff and a mayor. One of the oldest things in Oxford is probably Port Meadow.It was mentioned in the original Domesday book and was an Iron age burial ground.The sheriff of Oxford still has horse races on the meadow once a year. Our twelve squares consist of common land,(Port Meadow),farmland,and residential.
